data.meta_description: Discover life events, stories and photos about Thomas Thurston (1633â1704) of Wrentham, Suffolk, England, United Kingdom.
data.text: When Thomas Thurston was born on 4 August 1633, in Wrentham, Suffolk, England, United Kingdom, his father, John Thurston, was 26 and his mother, Margaret Buck, was 29. He married Sarah Thaxter on 13 December 1655, in Medfield, Suffolk, Massachusetts Bay Colony, British Colonial America. They were the parents of at least 4 sons and 6 daughters. He died on 20 May 1704, in Medfield, Suffolk, Massachusetts Bay Colony, British Colonial America, at the age of 70.
